metadata.name: The Narrows
metadata.description:
On a moody afternoon in June, 2018 I was driving on the Belt Parkway in Brooklyn, New York when I saw a thick fog rolling under the Verrazano Narrows Bridge.

I pulled my car to the side of the highway and stopped traffic to get this shot as it's not often we see this fog engulfing the bridge like they do in San Francisco.

The VZ bridge was opened in 1964 and connects the boroughs of Brooklyn and Staten Island.
